Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Visa Officer erred in finding the applicant inadmissible for misrepresentation under s. 40(1)(a) of the IRPA
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant provided inconsistent information and lacked credibility regarding employment history and job offers
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Employment records, job offer letters, application forms
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Inconsistent and false statements about employment history and qualifications
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of misrepresentations to the immigration decision
Crimes.Application_Error: Providing inaccurate details about work experience and employer connections
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation or withholding material facts that could induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Application_Factor: Requirement of 8 years of experience in meat products industry
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Potential error by Visa Officer in assessing misrepresentation
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Dismissed – no breach of procedural fairness
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inconsistent and false information about employment history and job offers
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to substantiate claims with credible evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of Visa Officer’s decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standards of review in administrative decisions

Crimes.Crime_Name: Withholding material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Visa Officer erred in finding Ms. Bellido inadmissible for misrepresentation under s. 40(1)(a) of the Act
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant failed to meet experience requirements and misrepresented employer relationships
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Failure to disclose accurate experience and falsified professional connections
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Materiality of withheld facts regarding required work experience
Crimes.Application_Error: Understated lack of qualifying experience and misrepresented job offers
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Withholding material facts that could induce error in administration of the Act
Crimes.Application_Factor: Requirement of 8 years of experience in meat products industry
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Potential error by Visa Officer in assessing omission of material facts
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Dismissed – no breach of procedural fairness
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Inconsistencies and falsehoods in employment history and job offers
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of corroborating evidence for claimed experience and employment
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Serious doubts about truthfulness of employment claims
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of Visa Officer’s conclusion
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standards of review in administrative decisions
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose full and accurate employment background
